Welcome to AI_beginner_course’s documentation!¶

We indtroduce
  • Install Nvidia Jetson nano Devloper kit and it settings

    • Install Prerequisites and Dependencies for Tensorflow

    • Donwload Our Projects from Github.

  • Try simple image classfication with Jetson nano.

    • Hello AI with Teachable Learning

    • Do it Yourself : image_classification (MNIST)

  • Use the advanced AI opensources.

    • Use Opensource 1 : Jetson-Inference

    • Use Opensource 2 : Deepstreams
